channel.title: Please help me with my Webclient
channel.description:
I'm sorry if this is the wrong section.
Anyway... I bought a vps and got all the files and everything on it. Then, i used the tobex rs-ps website for a Webclient. The server is done, and up and everything. There's just one problem. I can login, but automatically after that, it dc's and logs me out. What should i do?

item.title: Please help me with my Webclient
item.dc:creator: @son_of_satin son of satin
item.description:
@son_of_satin wrote:

Thanks for trying to help. I already have a no-ip account. I have the DUC, and the ip’s and everything are switched to what is shown on the no-ip. Like i said… The server is all ready. I have a Webclient. it lets me login, which tells me that i did everything right? Just… After logging in, it dc’s and brings me back to the login page.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me with my Webclient

item.title: Please help me with my Webclient
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

Try to find gui.java or client.java and search for the ip.
Use local host ips to test:
127.0.0.1
0.0.0.0
Make a no-ip host(NOTE: you must have a no-ip account and DUC).
then replace the ip with your no-ip. For example:
127.0.0.1 to example.no-ip.biz

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me with my Webclient
